Container.Name: exportarr
Container.Overview: Exportarr allows you to share your Radarr/Sonarr lists with others, without having to give them your Radarr API key, or open external ports to Radarr/Sonarr. :) Others just copy the URL for the genre they want, then use this as an importable list in Sonarr/Radarr. Then, as you add new titles to your Sonarr/Radarr, your friends will see them updated daily in thier Sonarr/Radarr apps.

Config.Name: Radarr URL
Config.Description: Fully qualified URL to Radarr, including any non-standard ports. E.G http://n.n.n.n:7878

Config.Name: Sonarr URL
Config.Description: Fully qualified URL to Sonarr, including any non-standard ports. E.G http://n.n.n.n:8989

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: The port that you want to access Exportarr on.
